[short] skip

go list -json ./...
go list -f '{{.}}' ./...

# Using a custom flag mixed with regular 'go test' flags should be OK.
! go list -json -f '{{.}}' ./...
stderr '^go list -f cannot be used with -json$'

# Using a custom flag mixed with regular 'go test' flags should be OK.
! go list -f '{{.}}' -json ./...
stderr '^go list -f cannot be used with -json$'
-- go.mod --
module m
-- list_test.go --
package list_test
